      • setTaskToUnDone

        public java.lang.Boolean setTaskToUnDone()
                                  throws JproworkRuntimeException
        Set a task’s status to not completed.
        Returns:
        Boolean. true on task status changed to undone. False otherwise
        Throws:
        JproworkRuntimeException

                             throws JproworkRuntimeException

        An - array of Member IDs
        Returns:

      • getUnassignedMembers

        public java.util.List<Member> getUnassignedMembers()
                                            throws JproworkRuntimeException
        Get Unassigned Members of a Task. This can be used to display a list of members to pick from to assign new members to a task.
        Returns:
        list of Prowork members that are unassigned
        Throws:
        JproworkRuntimeException
        See Also:
